title: Alaska
description: Mia's heart made a sound that no one heard except for Mia late one night when she woke from dreams into darkness.Ethan was asleep beside her, and Em was a forest away. Outside it was night and dark and Alaska. The sky was upside down.When Mia follows her sister halfway across the world to Alaska, she discovers that love can be found in the most unexpected and beautiful of places. But can Mia find the courage to follow her heart in Alaska? And what if the one you love is not all that you wish them to be?
author: Sue Saliba
